```{r}
library(tidycensus)
library(tidyverse)
library(tigris)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(here)
```



```{r}
ar_income <- get_acs(
  geography = "tract", 
  variables = "B19013_001", 
  state = "VA", 
  county = "Arlington", 
  geometry = TRUE,
  year = 2021,
  progress = FALSE
)

ggplot()+
  geom_sf(data = ar_income, aes(fill = estimate) ) +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "#cfe8f3" , high = "#062635",
                      labels = scales::dollar) +
  theme_minimal()
```
